ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates discontinuous lines series and column series, where gaps can be inserted into the chart by using double.NaN
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how double.NaN can be used to render gaps or continuous lines in a line chart, and gaps in a mountain or column chart.
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b]
In this example, you can
- Drag X-Axis to scale. - Drag Y-Axis to scale. - Double click to zoom to extents.
